item.title: Linux batch file manipulation - based on find,xargs
item.description: Preface #In the beginning stages of a project, it is common to encounter various file operations, copying header files, libraries, batch renaming, and so on. Once the file structure is complex, this will be a boring job. Find the files #find searches for files in the directory structure, which is how it is described inside man.
